name: Operation NX78
description:
Submission for Brakeys Game Jam 2020.2 (https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-4)

Theme:- "Rewind" A game where the player plays as a FBI agent, rewinding tapes and finding clues about a bomb attack which has been planned by terrorists. Clues has been hidden within tape recordings. Timers has been set for hints to appear if player finds it difficult to solve.

(In my opinion solving puzzles within the time is much fun(Just Saying :) ).

Team:- Ex-Engineers

Game Designed, Voice Overs:- I, Me and Myself

Game Story and Scripts:- Asutosh (A much talented gamer, a vivid IT guy, a friend)

Also do, Rate, Comment and Share Feedback. Arigato.

Credits

Audio:- Recorded and Modified with Adobe Audition

Gif's Links:- Gifer
